entry.title: Time Series Databases and Forecasting with FB Prophet

entry.content:
Description

"Time Series Databases and Forecasting with FB Prophet" by: Anais Dotis-Georgiou

Data collection is only part of the battle. The other half is being able to easily perform data analysis. FB Prophet aims to make time-series forecasting simple and fast. In this latest talk, we’ll learn about time-series databases and how to make a time-series prediction with Prophet and InfluxDB.

Recorded at the 2020 Python Web Conference (https://2020.pythonwebconf.com)
